LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Exalted.description: Passing on one's knowledge is a purely respectful act. The authors of this world and their heirs shall be the ones to inherit it and all of it’s fruits.
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Disliked.label: disliked
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Disliked.description: Why write down what can be taught much quicker semantically or through trial and error? What an absolute waste of time.
